narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: El Mirador Incorporated is a Home Health provider based in Albuquerque, NM. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $100.8M in Medicaid payments across 658K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $100.8M in taxpayer-funded Medicaid payments — enough to fund healthcare for approximately 12,599 Medicaid beneficiaries for a full year at average per-enrollee costs.
